desc: Show version
Add file(s) to the topmost/named patch
Print an annotated listing of the given file
Print a list of applied patches
Remove the topmost/given patch from the series file
Produces a diff of the given file(s) in the topmost/given patch
Edit the given file(s) in $EDITOR
Lists files that the topmost/given patch changes
Integrate the patch read from standard input into the topmost patch
Import external patches
Create mail messages from patches in the series file, stores/sends them
Creates new patch with the given name, inserts it after topmost patch
Prints name of patch after the topmost/given patch in the series file
Print the list of patches that modify the given file
Remove patch(es) from the stack of applied patches
Prints name of patch before the topmost/given patch in the series file
Apply patch(es) from the series file
Refresh the given patch, or the topmost patch by default
Remove one or more files from the topmost/named patch
Rename the topmost/named patch
Initializes a source tree from an rpm spec or a quilt series file
Prints name of the topmost patch in the current stack of applied patches
List patches not applied or patches that follow the patch in the series file
Upgrade meta-data in a working tree to the current version of quilt
